mainSequence.step: USER requests VC offer from TAS
TAS sends VC offer request to ISSUER
ISSUER responds with VC offer to USER
USER confirms the VC offer
CA requests VC Plan ID List from TAS
TAS returns VC Plan ID List response to CA
CA issues VC start request to TAS
TAS sends issue VC start request to ISSUER
ISSUER responds with issue VC start response
CA sends ECDH Request to TAS
TAS responds with ECDH Response to CA
CA sends Issue Profile Request to TAS
TAS sends Issue Profile Request to ISSUER
ISSUER responds with Issue Profile Response
CA requests VC issuance from WALLET through TAS
TAS sends Issue VC request to ISSUER
ISSUER performs VC issuance and registers VC Meta in BC
ISSUER responds with VC response
WALLET decrypts and stores the VC
CA requests Issue VC completion
TAS sends Request Issue VC completion to ISSUER
ISSUER responds with VC issuance completion response
